claim_card.claim: Black holes are reframed as recursive coherence sinks/regulators; Hawking temperature is interpreted as residual coherence flux escaping due to finite recursive delay (not thermal randomness).
claim_card.test_hook: Map the proposed ‘recursive delay’ interpretation to a quantitative model; check whether it reproduces standard scaling relations while yielding new falsifiable signatures.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Hawking temperature ... residual coherence flux escaping due to finite recursive delay
